description: Ministry of Labour and Labouar Relations - Appointed Mr. S. Wirithamulla as Arbitrator for settle the dispute between Mr. R. M. P. Ramanayake and three others of the one part & Sri lanka Ports Authority - Appointed Mr. M. D. K. Kulatunga as arbitrator for settle the dispute between Mr. I. M. P. Ilangasinghe & Sri Lanka Mahaweli Authority - Industrial dispute Act No. 131 - My No. JR/21/19/2012
